item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Well be specific.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2009, 08:10:19 pm[/size][hr]err Not sure try using this Code.

for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
			if(npcs[i].npcType == 3000){
if(misc.random(25)==0){
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if(misc.random(1)==0){
npcs[i].textUpdate = "Crush them underfoot!";
} else {
npcs[i].textUpdate = "All glory to Bandos!";
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = "Break their bones!";
}
}
}

Or

			if(npcs[i].npcType == 3000){

}
npcs[i].textUpdate = "Break their bones!";
